name: jackparsons
text: A comment left by jackparsons was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, atticusonline, DorothyPoopBot)

name: _cheesekayke
text: At this point we are unsure as to whether Teodor is going to make out with Rod Huggins' dick.

name: carlyle
text: YES thank you I can READ because it is RIGHT there in FRONT OF me

name: ariamaki
text:
Huh- It is almost like AltText doesn't display for some people, or there was a point in time where it wouldn't display for nearly anyone, and you are being a dick to a dude about it.

Oh wait.

name: carlyle
text:
I chubbied you because I see where you are coming from. I was a different person ten months ago.

But now I've quite the hard drugs, the drinkin', landed a job and got a lady! I'm a new man!

name: hypoluxa
text: Yet another one where the alt text brings it on home for me.

name: zem
text: yeah alt text makes this one a five

name: dusty
text: God how I wish i could save a baby seal in front of Kate Winslet. Or a baby polar bear in front of that girl from almost famous. I'd even be happy with rescuing a duck in front of the lady who plays Phoebe on Friends.

name: professorhazard
text:
The next logical steps are:
- rescuing a small rodent in front of Kathy Griffin
- rescuing an insect in front of Lisa Lampanelli

name: dusty
text: and finally, changing your mind about eating a walnut in front of Kathy lee Gifford.

name: cailetshadow
text: or refraining from beating your child in front of eleanor roosevelt.

name: dusty
text: To reach this comment go down in greatness then back in time.

name: belgand
text: Or rape a pony to death in front of Queen Victoria.

name: atticusonline
text: ...what?

name: belgand
text:
The axis was established as "young, attractive person from a recent time period" and "act of kindness or great evil".

Queen Victoria is both older and significantly less attractive than Eleanor Roosevelt and raping a pony to death is basically the worst thing a person can do.

name: dusty
text: I can see you were trying to do some kind of opposite thing, but the original line was about and odd way impressing a woman, and what you described an odd way of declaring war on England, which is skew of impressing a woman, but not quite opposite to it. But maybe I'm mistaken and you just feel that queen Victoria is a little bit sexy and would be mildly impressed by the act of raping a pony to death. I defy you to find that sentence written anywhere else in the world.

name: belgand
text: I didn't say I was raping the pony at her. Or that it was her pony. I just happen to be raping a pony to death and, oh look, here comes Queen Victoria....

name: atticusonline
text: You keep your penis away from this message board.

name: dusty
text: It's like how a glove slap is a challenge for duel, its not that it necessitates war, but that it is a signal of that intention.

name: belgand
text: I'm not raping the pony at her, she merely observes me raping a pony to death. Perhaps I'm not even raping the pony in England, but some other country that she just happens to be in at the moment.

name: cailetshadow
text: Well, now it just sounds like a hit new reality tv show.

name: belgand
text: Do you rape a pony, but lose if in doing so you cause it to die? The goal being to rape the pony as hard and long as possible, but not kill it?

name: atticusonline
text: Is...is that how they make veal?

name: cailetshadow
text: Have you been talking to Lie Bot again, little Philippe?

name: tekende
text: What the fuck happened here

name: belgand
text: Oh, did you want a turn with the pony?

name: atticusonline
text: This veal is delicious!

name: rumblefish
text: By offering Queen Victoria a chance at the tender young pony you have mollified her avoiding war.

name: spicyponyhead
text:
I'm coming back here, several months after I read and chubbied this comment, to say how fucking awesome it is.

I shared this with my boyfriend, who I've gotten into Achewood, and soon afterwards, a small framed portrait of Queen Victoria appeared in his home.

name: spicyponyhead
text: p.s. to get back here, I typed in "rape pony queen victoria achewood" (without quotes) to Google. Frighteningly, there were other results, one being a 19 year old Female's OKCupid dating profile.

name: belgand
text: Was she a pony girl?

name: dusty
text: She probably just listed her favorite music as Rape Pony Queen and Victoria Achewood. It is a bit odd to see a hair metal band and an American idol singer on the same list.

name: spicyponyhead
text:
I searched again, just to find out. She's an autistic 19 year old from Alaska who's taken over 3500 "quizzes" on OKCupid. I guess there's nothing else to do in Alaska?

Choice quote from her profile: "You find me interesting but are NOT a pervert...and please try to spell right"
